lines.text: change soroban [ 1 ] to " O - | O - OOO "
change soroban [ 2 ] to " O - | OO - OO "
change soroban [ 3 ] to " O - | OOO - O "
change soroban [ 6 ] to " - O | O - OOO "
change soroban [ 7 ] to " - O | OO - OO "
change soroban [ 8 ] to " - O | OOO - O "
create int len = length of s
for i from len - 1 to 0 inclusive counting down , print soroban [ s [ i ] - ' 0 ' ]
lines.code: for ( int i = len - 1 ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) cout << soroban [ s [ i ] - ' 0 ' ] << endl ;
